statements: SELECT * FROM member_information;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM member_information WHERE policy_number = 1001;
SELECT * FROM member_information WHERE policy_number > 1000;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details, contact_information FROM member_information WHERE policy_number = 1002;
SELECT policy_number, contact_information FROM member_information WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%health%';
SELECT * FROM member_information WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT contact_information, coverage_details FROM member_information WHERE policy_number = 54321;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details, contact_information FROM member_information WHERE policy_number IN (98765, 24680);
SELECT * FROM member_information WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%hospital%';
SELECT MAX(policy_number) AS max_policy_number FROM member_information;
SELECT * FROM MemberInformation;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM MemberInformation;
SELECT contact_information FROM MemberInformation WHERE policy_number = 123;
SELECT * FROM MemberInformation ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT policy_number, claim_amount FROM MemberInformation JOIN ClaimsInformation ON MemberInformation.policy_number = ClaimsInformation.policy_number;
SELECT * FROM MemberInformation WHERE policy_number = 12345;
SELECT policy_number, contact_information FROM MemberInformation WHERE coverage_details LIKE 'Medical%';
SELECT * FROM ClaimsInformation WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_of_claim DESC;
SELECT policy_number, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM ClaimsInformation GROUP BY policy_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT Members.policy_number, contact_information, date_of_claim, claim_amount FROM MemberInformation AS Members INNER JOIN ClaimsInformation AS Claims ON Members.policy_number = Claims.policy_number WHERE Members.policy_number = 54321;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_number, start_date FROM policies WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT member_id, contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM members ORDER BY policy_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM members WHERE coverage_details IS NOT NULL;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT members.member_id, members.policy_number, policies.policy_type FROM members JOIN policies ON members.policy_number = policies.policy_number ORDER BY members.member_id;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT policy_number, contact_name FROM Members WHERE contact_email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT claim_number, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT contact_type, phone_number, address FROM Contacts ORDER BY contact_type DESC, phone_number ASC;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM Policies;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT claim_number, claim_date, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date, contact_name, contact_email FROM Policies JOIN Members ON Policies.member_id = Members.member_id;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, contact_type, phone_number FROM Members JOIN Contacts ON Members.member_id = Contacts.member_id;
SELECT * FROM Members;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Members ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT member_id, COUNT(*) FROM Policies GROUP BY member_id;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM Policies WHERE coverage_details LIKE '%health%';
SELECT c.claim_id, p.policy_number, c.claim_description, c.claim_amount FROM Claims c JOIN Policies p ON c.policy_number = p.policy_number;
SELECT * FROM Members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Members WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT policy_number, coverage_details FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT member_id, address, city, state, postal_code FROM ContactInformation WHERE state = 'California';

SELECT c.claim_id, p.policy_number, c.claim_description, c.claim_amount, py.payment_amount, py.payment_date FROM Claims c JOIN Payments py ON c.claim_id = py.claim_id JOIN Policies p ON c.policy_number = p.policy_number;
